email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We have an urgent requirement for shipping 12,500MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms. Could you provide a vessel option and a freight quote? The laycan window is 25-30 September.

Best regards,
Liam Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 85,000, LOA 225m, currently available for your cargo. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 September as requested. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you review the rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

I understand your concern. Given our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised rate of USD 41.00 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD 41.00 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the OCEAN HARMONY with a laycan of 25-30 September? Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Liam
